title: Scarlet Woman

fields.name: Attributes:

- The first time a head or power role dies, you take over there role.

desc:
Post 3665
*‚ÄùYou have shown me the secrets of the Council of the Purple Flame. We have lain together in fire and in lust and in beastly commune, and I am forever your servant. But tonight, my dear, I am your master."*
